class.name: AudioEffectRecord
class.brief_description: Audio effect used for recording the audio that passes through it.
class.description: Allows the user to record the sound passing through the effect into an [AudioStreamWAV]. When used on the "Master" audio bus, this includes all audio output by Godot. Unlike [AudioEffectCapture], this effect encodes the recording with the given format (8-bit, 16-bit, or compressed) instead of giving access to the raw audio samples. Can be used (with an [AudioStreamMicrophone]) to record from a microphone. [b]Note:[/b] [member ProjectSettings.audio/driver/enable_input] must be [code]true[/code] for audio input to work. See also that setting's description for caveats related to permissions and operating system privacy settings.

method.name: is_recording_active
method.description: Returns whether the recording is active or not.

method.name: set_recording_active
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the sound will be recorded. Note that restarting the recording will remove the previously recorded sample.

members.member: Specifies the format in which the sample will be recorded.
